alert.note: Alert for San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 2:48AM MST until January 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations ranging between 2 and 6 inches with locally higher amounts on some mountain peaks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From Noon today to 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Southwest Mountains
